sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PURCHS_ID, A.MBER_NO, A.QY, A.PURCHS_DE, C.DLVY_STTUS AS DLVY_SE, B.GOODS_ID, B.GOODS_NM, B.PRICE FROM RTETNPURCHSLIST A, RTETNGOODS B, RTETNDLVYINFO C WHERE A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID AND A.DLVY_SE = C.DLVY_SE AND A.MBER_NO = #mberNo# AND B.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') ORDER BY PURCHS_ID DESC LIMIT #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT A.PURCHS_ID, A.MBER_NO, A.QY, A.PURCHS_DE, A.DLVY_SE, B.GOODS_ID, B.GOODS_NM, B.PRICE FROM RTETNPURCHSLIST A, RTETNGOODS B WHERE A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID AND B.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') ORDER BY PURCHS_ID DESC LIMIT #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#
SELECT A.PURCHS_ID, A.MBER_NO, A.QY, A.PURCHS_DE, A.DLVY_SE, B.GOODS_ID, B.GOODS_NM, B.PRICE FROM RTETNPURCHSLIST A, RTETNGOODS B WHERE A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID ORDER BY PURCHS_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RTETNPURCHSLIST A, RTETNGOODS B WHERE A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID AND B.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') AND A.MBER_NO = #mberNo#
